lead_paragraph: LeBron James and the Cavaliers rested up and waited through a tumultuous Western Conference finals before finding themselves right back where they were last year, going against the Warriors for the NBA title.

headline.print_headline: Cavs, LeBron Find Same Title Hope Obstacle in Golden State
headline.main: Cavs, LeBron Find Same Title Hope Obstacle in Golden State
